pkgmetadata.longdescription: # sclblonnx[![PyPI Release](https://github.com/scailable/sclblonnx/workflows/PyPI%20Release/badge.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/sclblonnx/)The `sclblonnx` package provides a high level API to construct and alter ONNX graphs.The basic usage is as follows:```pythonimport sclblonnx as sog = so.empty_graph()n1 = so.node('Add', inputs=['x1', 'x2'], outputs=['sum'])g = so.add_node(g, n1)# etc.```Please see the `examples/` folder in this repo for examples.
